scripts.package: pnpm --filter server run build:prod && pnpm --filter web run build --webpack && electron-forge package
scripts.package:noproxy: pnpm --filter server run build:prod && pnpm --filter web run build --webpack && env -u http_proxy -u https_proxy -u HTTP_PROXY -u HTTPS_PROXY -u all_proxy -u ALL_PROXY -u no_proxy -u NO_PROXY electron-forge package
scripts.make: pnpm --filter server run build:prod && pnpm --filter web run build --webpack && electron-forge make
scripts.make:noproxy: pnpm --filter server run build:prod && pnpm --filter web run build --webpack && env -u http_proxy -u https_proxy -u HTTP_PROXY -u HTTPS_PROXY -u all_proxy -u ALL_PROXY -u no_proxy -u NO_PROXY electron-forge make
